name: Reliance Worldwide Corporation
description: Reliance Worldwide Corporation (RWC) is a leading global manufacturer and supplier of plumbing and bathroom products, primarily focusing on the residential and commercial sectors. Established in 1949, RWC has built a strong reputation for innovation, quality, and reliability. The company specializes in advanced plumbing solutions, including water flow control products, piping systems, and fixtures, utilizing cutting-edge technology to enhance performance and sustainability. RWC’s flagship products include the SharkBite push-to-connect plumbing system, which revolutionizes the installation process by providing a quick and reliable way to connect pipes without the need for soldering or special tools. With a commitment to environmental sustainability, RWC also prioritizes energy-efficient and water-saving products that contribute to responsible resource management. Operating in multiple countries, including the United States, Australia, and the UK, Reliance Worldwide Corporation is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and maintaining strong partnerships with distributors, contractors, and builders. The company continues to innovate and expand its product offerings, ensuring it meets the evolving needs of the construction and plumbing industries while striving to enhance the quality of life through effective plumbing solutions.
